snippet: Jonathan Vilma, a team captain, was suspended without pay for the coming season; Cleveland’s Scott Fujita, Green Bay’s Anthony Hargrove, and New Orleans’s Will Smith received lesser penalties.
abstract: NFL suspends New Orleans Saints defensive captain Jonathan Vilma without pay for the 2012 season for his role in the team's bounty scandal; three other former and current Saints receive lesser penalties.
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Vilma, a team captain, was suspended without pay for the coming season; Cleveland’s Scott Fujita, Green Bay’s Anthony Hargrove, and New Orleans’s Will Smith received lesser penalties.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Suspends Vilma and Three Other Players for Saints’ Bounties
headline.main: N.F.L. Suspends Vilma and Three Other Players for Bounty Scheme
headline.print_headline: N.F.L. Suspends Vilma and Three Other Players for Bounty Scheme
